scripts.customer:deep-i: cd apps/customer bun i && npx expo prebuild && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.customer:ios: cd apps/customer/ios && pod install && cd .. && watchman watch-del-all && npx expo run:ios
scripts.shopper:deep-i: cd apps/shopper bun i && npx expo prebuild && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.shopper:ios: cd apps/shopper/ios && pod install && cd .. && watchman watch-del-all && npx expo run:ios
